subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Colloquial form of the departing-tone variant of {{ltc-l|作|to do|id=2}}, to differentiate from the checked-tone variant (now represented by {{lang|zh|作}}). Loss of checked codas in Mandarin has resulted in homophony of the two.
